scrolling lamp

The scrolling light common box (also called as moving or rotating light box) is an advertising light box this successively displays different posters in the image up to 6TH posters. The principle is usually to use the digital scrolling system to rotate each pipes to achieve your effect of installing multiple images available as one light box, and the time of each one posters scrolling is It could be customized according to the various requirements of customers, which greatly enriches the form of light box promoting.

Scrolling light boxes will always be a wide-ranging light box, they can always be affecting the streets and alleys, and the scrolling lamp scrolling advertising form is quite attractive, allowing pedestrians to stand inside the eye, is a instrument for advertising. 1. The scrolling lamp adopts a digital scrolling manipulate system, which is extremely smooth and noise-free once the poster is converted which enable it to be placed in an environment that should be kept quiet.

2. There are actually usually three types associated with scrolling light boxes, that cold steel plate displayed, aluminum profiles, stainless metallic, and the materials accustomed to make the light bins are strong and long-lasting. The aluminum profile scrolling lamp has a short engineering period, and its aluminum has strong adhesion, and there isn’t any discoloration or plaque once spraying. Cold plates and stainless can be made straight into various self-shaped shapes through bending and welding.

THREE. The scrolling light field adopts LED light resource, soft light, long living, high brightness, low warm and low power consumption. The scrolling light common box canvas uses PP papers, backlit film, etc.,which complement both and add a strong and beautiful scenery to the city.

4. The materials with the scrolling light box are mostly manufactured from recyclable resources. The lightbox is beneficial to our environment, energy-saving and easy make use of.

5. The scrolling light box is usually equipped with LED electronic display over the light box, words playback, electronic calendar, remote device, multiple light boxes running concurrently and other functions.
